act: SUGAR INDUSTRY SPECIAL FUNDS (SPECIAL  PROVISIONS) ACT

type.name: section
type.title: Short title and commencement.
type.context: SUGAR INDUSTRY SPECIAL FUNDS (SPECIAL  PROVISIONS) ACT under Short title and commencement. 1.  This Act may be cited as the Sugar Industry Special Funds (Special Provisions) Act.
type.description: This Act may be cited as the Sugar Industry Special Funds (Special Provisions) Act.
